verses.roman:
'ṣaṭ sandarbhe' kṛṣṇa-prema-tattva prakāśila
cāri-lakṣa grantha teṅho vistāra karila

synonyms: ṣaṭ sandarbhe—in the Ṣaṭ-sandarbha: kṛṣṇa-prema-tattva—the truth about transcendental love of Kṛṣṇa; prakāśila—he exhibited; cāri-lakṣa grantha—400,000 verses; teṅho—he; vistāra karila—expanded.
translation: In the Ṣaṭ-sandarbha Śrīla Jīva Gosvāmī set forth the truths about the transcendental love of Kṛṣṇa. In this way he expanded 400,000 verses in all his books.
